segments.text: I see the woman standing there, absorbed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems so calm, drying the plate as if nothing unusual is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I can't help but notice the water spilling over the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It creates a puddle that could easily lead to someone slipping.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she should be more aware of her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are up to something, and it makes me anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is precariously perched on that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if he even sees the danger he's in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so eager, reaching out for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It almost seems innocent amidst the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can only hope that nobody gets hurt today.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can the woman not see what's going on behind her?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is serene, a stark contrast to the mess inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could just grab her attention and point it out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But here, I just stand and watch, feeling powerless.
segments.speaker: PAR
